Class COM.sootNsmoke.instructions.Label 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----COM.sootNsmoke.instructions.Sequence

public class Label
extends Sequence
Not really an instruction, but nore of a locator, Whenever the label with this label tag is used in a branch instruction (like Goto or Ifeq), the instruction which is next in the Sequence after this Label is the real target

Label(String)
The label is a tag which can be used in the various branch instructions

toBytecodes(Bytecodes)
Converts the instruction sequence to an array of bytecodes.
toString()
